Reviews.Title: Amazingly Cheap... Insane Quality! Get It!
Reviews.Author: BrimoKnight
Reviews.Content: This is a very short and simple review. The camera ROCKS! Super easy to use, and navigate. It has many, and even more functions than I will need, but It doesn't overwhelm you! Turn on the camera and your ready to shoot. I love that the camera is a genius. No seriously, this camera detects your surroundings, SMART EH?. If its too dark it will adjust to twilight mode, or maybe there's a view of mountains and fields, the cam will instantly switch to landscape mode. It feels awesome to no longer need to turn any knobs so that the scene focus can change. Aside from this, what really-really made me want this camera was how the panorama shot sounded. Reading the feature before purchase really interested me. After I received the cam and tried it, I was so amazed at the intense wide capture my cam could make. Sure, if you sweep your hand to fast or shaky, you may just get a weird boxy image. However, take your time sweeping your hand and relax, and the image is beautiful enough to make you own home wall art. Lastly, I took video and the quality looked great on cam, I haven't uploaded video yet so I have no further details as to how good of quality video really is, but the pictures all come out stunning. Pfft, funny part is, I even have it on a lower pixel setting to capture a size of around 4x6... Everyone, no regrets... buy this truly cheap camera and forget about going to Walmart for a deal... Clearly the deal of quality and price is right here with this Sony. How I see it, I should scream to ya... GET IT NOW! :D

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: No Name Baby
Reviews.Content: I needed a new everyday camera. I have 2 young kids and I needed something that I could throw in my purse and use at baseball games and school functions. This camera takes clear colorful pictures, has a great battery life and is easy to use for pics or video. Downloads to my laptop took seconds. For the $100 price tag you just can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Jz
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived as expected, and it does what it suppose to do! I did quite a bit of research and review before purchasing this camera! I already have a digital SLR, so I only need one for capturing everyday events like in school, at work, or visiting folks, day to day photography can only be made convenient with portable digital camera such as this one, imaging carry a SLR all day long :) ANyway, so it is however like a toy though, made with cheap plastics, appear super light, thus gives off a "fragile" vibe. Function wise, it is pretty decent, I pick this one especially for its build in "isteady" function, image quality is pretty good too, have an auto scene detection function that select the best image mode for you! Most impressive feature however though is the smile detection function, automatically takes a picture when subject smiles! pretty neat!over all, I am happy with this purchase at this point, now the question would be how long will it last? I will update this review once something come up!

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier with this camera (No SD Card included)
Reviews.Author: J. Ciriello "AdWhois"
Reviews.Content: ***Quick Note: This camera does not come with an SD card***When I bought this camera I was looking for a cheaper alternative to my DSLR camera that I could take with me to events where my big camera wasn't allowed or when I just didn't feel like taking the DSLR with me... This camera fits the bill perfectly.The Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W510 is very small and the large screen takes up most of the real estate on the back. It's good to look for a physical zoom in a digital camera, which this one has and it works very well.I'm extremely impressed with the flash on this camera, maybe I've been using cellphone cameras for too long but I haven't seen a flash that's as bright and works as well as this one does on a Point and Shoot in a long while. Aside from just taking pictures, the camera can take video(with audio) and the really cool thing that's take panorama pictures in one shot. You simply hold down the button and rotate the camera, it does the rest... Very cool.I use a 4gb sandisk SD card and it seem to have plenty space (especially if you drop the quality down from 12MP). As I mentioned in the note, there was no SD card included with the camera so be sure to pick one up here on Amazon when you buy the camera to save yourself from in-store overpricing.This camera is definitely recommended, its a great price, compact size, good quality image, and comes with a rechargeable battery(and charger). What more could you want from a Point and Shoot?Hope this review helped!

Reviews.Title: Flash WAY too bright
Reviews.Author: Lauren Ashley Justice
Reviews.Content: I may have just gotten a bad model but every single picture I have taken with this camera is WAY too overexposed. The flash completely washes out every person in the picture no matter how far away we stand and even the background.  I've never experienced this before on a point and shoot camera.  I don't know why it's doing this and I wanted to see if anyone else had this problem and/or if anyone knows how to fix this issue? I really wish I didn't have this problem- seemed like such a great deal and otherwise has great reviews!  Unfortunately at this time, I plan on returning this item and buying anther point and shoot digital camera.  I wish I could add a picture I've taken for an example of what I am describing. Thank for any help!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: pkup83
Reviews.Content: I like this camera a lot.  It's priced right and its very easy to use. Most of the cameras functions are automatic so you end up with great photos.  Overall very happy with this camera!

Reviews.Title: Would not reccomend this camera
Reviews.Author: CP
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as a gift for Christmas.  I literally have used it 2x and it is broken.  It will not close its lens and will not take pictures. When I went to return the camera, I had missed the window of return by ONE DAY.  Now I am stuck with a broken camera.  I have talked with others who have also purchased this camera and had the same issue.  This camera is NOT a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Heberto
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived without any trouble. I recommend it, takes wonderful pictures and amazing videos. It is really light and the battery has a long life. Great camera

Reviews.Title: Simple Camera
Reviews.Author: CoCo E.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a Christmas present for my mother. From the description I knew it was going to be very user friendly, which is good, as she is someone who has been using a disposable camera forever. For the serious photographer who wants a small camera, this one may not be the best for you because there aren't very many special things you can do with it (black and whites, digital macro, etc.) It's very much a point and shoot camera. I found the price to be reasonable for what you get. I think she'll like it!

Reviews.Title: Battery Door Issues
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera does everything and then some. Everything works as advertised and it takes great pictures. However, the battery door will not keep latched. A slight touch and it pops open. Very poor design for a camera that appears to be well engineered in every other aspect! Guess I'll carry a rool of tape with me!

Reviews.Title: It does the job
Reviews.Author: Ivan
Reviews.Content: If you are not looking for fancy camera, this one will do the job.Display quality is not that great(3/5) but after you see the pictures on the PC results are better.Picture Quality it's OK and it's not heavy or bulky at all.I mostly use it for work (Engineering) and some ocations that are not relevant.I have other DSC for really special ocations =).Then only thing I did not like is the autofocus but nowadays most of the cameras have.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera..not great camera
Reviews.Author: N. Sallies
Reviews.Content: Takes really good pics..if your subjects are completely still, takes a while after pushing the button for the camera to take the pic.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot
Reviews.Author: Heaven
Reviews.Content: I got this product because Sony usually has good products but with this one it feels really cheap and picture quality isn't very great at all. Would not recommend to any one!

Reviews.Title: Very bad for indoor pics
Reviews.Author: godisgood
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I lost my old Coolpix 2200 in a move. In bright lighting or outside this sony is fine. However, indoors it is awful. Grainy and dark, no good.  The panoramic feature appears to be pretty cool. There is NO viewfinder, not crazy about that either. For me, this camera won't work out. The majority of my pics are indoors. Good luck.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Dealfinder
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a cheap camera for my upcoming trip to Hawaii. I didn't want to spend a lot of money due to the fact that I just spent a bunch of money on the plane ticket so I searched amazon for weeks and finally decided to get this camera since the reviews weren't too horrible. The flash on this thing is TERRIBLE! It is way too bright so your face ends up ghost white and the background is swallowed by darkness; so basically you can say good bye to night photos. Pictures without flash come out alright as long as it is very light out. I really expected more from Sony since my last camera was amazing but oh well, that's what you get for $79. I will be selling this camera and buying a new one shortly.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber shot DSC W 510
Reviews.Author: concordkyle
Reviews.Content: We just purchased this Sony Camera from Amazon.Com last week and already have it up and going. My husband takes pictures of his finished products as a collision repairman and needs a dependable digital camera. The camera package included USB cord to download pictures, battery, wall charger, wrist band and DVD for users. The camera arrived within 3 days of purcahse. Great buy. We are Sony purchasers and stick with a true brand.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Content: Met all my expectations for this level of a digital camera.  A good, general-to-casual use camera for a low price.

Reviews.Title: Fun.
Reviews.Author: Kerry Hart
Reviews.Content: I bought this used and had to buy batteries for it since the sony n lithium battery didn't work and that came with it.  It is a fun camera. I have yet to look at my pics on a computer though but I am sure they look good.

Reviews.Title: Great camera at a great price.
Reviews.Author: C. E. Addison
Reviews.Content: Being used to single reflex cameras, it took a bit of getting used to.  Picture quality is good as well as ease of operation.  My first sojourn into digital photography and I love every minute of it.  Great camera, good price.  My wife uses it more than I do.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: J. Ballou
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera! It can do so much and I just love it. The red is stunning, the picture quality is great, and it's very easy to use!

Reviews.Title: Flash is very strong
Reviews.Author: C. Campedelli
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift to my mom. She loves it because she can take pictures of her grandchildren and she's a happy camper. But I own a much better camera, so I can tell the difference. The flash on this model is very strong, very bright. Me, as a young adult, am able to deal with the exposure and all of that. My mom, as a 53 year old, can't. She likes it either way, and is as happy as she could be, but if I've known better, I would have gotten her a different one.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: francisco guarecuco
Reviews.Content: el equipo cumple contodas las especificaciones que se establecen en el articulo, muy buen equipo, recomendado a los usuarios de los mismos

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: body
Reviews.Content: my friends are happy and so am i thanks for this item it was handled with care and i am grateful for that

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: R Andersen "allan r"
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed in this product. Photos are washed out and too easily sun bleached, parts started breaking after only a few weeks (battery door for example). The camera just feels cheap. I guess you get what you pay for but since it was a Cyber-Shot we expected quality as in the other 2 Cyber-Shots (different models though) we have owned. Would not recommend this model or color...

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Tifany Chavez
Reviews.Content: la camara llego en muy buen estado, esta enterita y trae todo bien, lo unico fue la caja q no vino del resto magnifico

Reviews.Title: This Phone Made Me a Hero!
Reviews.Author: Becky Stahlecker
Reviews.Content: My daughter in law LOVED this camera, and I became a SUPER HERO in her eyes.  Bought a lime green one for my daughter, too!  It's the perfect camera for people on the go.  Fits in your purse or pocket, great images, adoralbe colors, and very good quality camera and pics!

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Hatem M Selim
Reviews.Content: It's pictures is fine with a good quality but I don't know why some times the picture came out in a very resolution

Reviews.Title: CAMARA SONY CYBER-SHOT
Reviews.Author: HAROLDO
Reviews.Content: excelente producto. lo recomiendo 100%. la mejor combinacion entre precio y calida. vendedor muy serio y responsable. el articulo llego a rapido y sin contratiempos, en buenas condiciones y totalmente nuevo. Camara Digital muy buena!

Reviews.Title: Excelente Calidad de Imagen
Reviews.Author: henry
Reviews.Content: La Camara es sencillamente excelente. No esperaba que fuera tan nitida, tan precisa, para lo pequeña y liviana que es. Ademas toma las fotos en movimiento perfectamente bien, y claras,.. enfoca los rotros tal cual como unaa camara profesional y las imagenes de paisajes,.. increibles,..!

Reviews.Title: Excelentes
Reviews.Author: Henrry
Reviews.Content: Muy buen servicio los recomiendo y la cámara es lo mejor excelente en todo lo recomiendo muy buen producto. 5 estrellas desde venezuela mis saludos.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: daisy
Reviews.Content: im not a camera expert and don't use it constantly if you just want a regular camera that takes good pictures and is reliable for special events every once in awhile this is great for the price.

Reviews.Title: pregunta
Reviews.Author: zabrynath
Reviews.Content: sorry, wanted to know if the camera when you buy comes with the charger, thanks and sorry, I could not buy the camera because I want to first 'know if it comes with the charger or not

Reviews.Title: NO MEMORY CARD
Reviews.Author: L. Cuellar
Reviews.Content: I haven't had the opportunity to use this camera yet as it came with NO MEMORY CARD!  What kinda camera doesn't come with a memory card?  And with no internal memory it's rendered useless until I can get one.  Ugh... otherwise: it's the perfect size.

Reviews.Title: buena camara
Reviews.Author: carlos
Reviews.Content: es buena camara lo unico malo es el barrido panoramico q no es la cantidad de grado q describe el producto al comprar tenga en consideracion q no es lo descrito por el producto son mucho menos grados viene con todos sus accesorios lo recomiendo desde guarenas venezuela

Reviews.Title: horrible camera
Reviews.Author: K. Robison "i_am_in_a_jar"
Reviews.Content: i had an old model cybershot and loved it. i lost it so my husband bought me this model. well i have had it for 3 months and the shakey hand doesnt go away. all the pictures are blurry so i sent it into to sony for repair ..they sent it back still broken. i contacted them again..there no help.. i will NEVER buy another sony product again.. i bought my husband a canon camera i love it..i will be investing in one my self..

Reviews.Title: Kool Camera
Reviews.Author: Cheribaby
Reviews.Content: I must say i was a bit reluctant to buy this camera but eventually i did cuz i needed one at a good price so i went ahead and purchased it. This turned out to be a great camera no regrets at all!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice, but lacks battery options
Reviews.Author: Curtis Jensen
Reviews.Content: Great camera.  While I understand the benefits of having a proprietary battery.  It would be nice if regular batteries fit in it too.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: l.o.l.
Reviews.Content: Great camera for a teenager! Simple to use, easy to upload pictures to Facebook. Lots  of picture options, black & white, sepia etc... Rechargeable battery is great.

Reviews.Title: Excelente articulo
Reviews.Author: Luis Gil Venezuela
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, if you look for a camera economical and easy to use this model is ideal for you. I've purchased for a friend here in Venezuela, Bolivar state.Excelente producto, si usted busca una camara economica y sencilla de usar este modelo es ideal para usted. Yo la he adquirido para una amiga aqui en venezuela-estado bolivar.

Reviews.Title: It is good
Reviews.Author: RITZ
Reviews.Content: The product is ok to me. The best thing is the cable, since you can see the pictures and videos on TV, by connecting the camera to the TV. It has a big screen, so you can see a detailed preview image before take the picture. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSC-W510
Reviews.Author: RD
Reviews.Content: I have the Sony DSC-WX9 and I needed a battery charger and an extra battery. After looking at how much they wanted for these items I was just going to forget about it. Then I saw this camera on sale and it has both items plus the camera. I bought this camera just for the two items but I have to say that this is a pretty nifty little camera. The build quality is ok but the pictures surprised me as they are of very good quality. Low Light Pictures are ok but pictures outside in good light are very good. It does not have optical stabilization but I have had no problem getting sharp and detailed photos. For the money I think this is a pretty good camera and you can find this on sale as they are making room for the new model. " Pretty Good Camera "

Reviews.Title: great pictures....great value
Reviews.Author: nico toscani
Reviews.Content: This is an great value for the features.  Panoramic pictures are easy to take and fun.  Just sweep the camera and it does the rest.  Would like to be able to use non-Sony memory cards.  Resolution is great...nice, sharp pictures.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W510 12.1 MP cámara fotográfica digital con 4x gran angular y zoom óptico de 2.7 pulgadas LCD (Negro)
Reviews.Author: gregory salas "gregory salas"
Reviews.Content: very good my choice when purchasing this Sony Cyber''-Shot DSC-W510 12.1 MP Digital Camera with 4x Wide Angle Optical Zoom 2.7 inch LCD (Black) My only recommendation would be that they added a memory card for this purchase is complete since only that I miss to be a full combo.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for everyday use!
Reviews.Author: allyson3826
Reviews.Content: I've only had this camera a couple of weeks now, but have been using it regularly since that date.  The first thing that struck me was how lightweight it was and I was afraid it may be rather cheaply made (that's why I gave it 4 stars rather than 5).  But I must admit it is very user-friendly and takes excellent quality pictures.  I am  no camera expert, so I've put it on the setting where it automatically chooses the best mode in various light conditions and I'm pretty happy with that setting.For the price, I'd definitely recommend this little gem to anyone wanting a good quality digital camera for everyday use.

Reviews.Title: Neat Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Naomi L. Berg "DragonSpeaker"
Reviews.Content: The product was on time and in perfect condition.  My daughter is a serious photographer, but she wanted something she could drop in her backpack and have for casual situations.  The Sony cybershot was a big hit with her.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: tamrod
Reviews.Content: Love the small size - can easily fit in shirt pocket. Great for when you're traveling or just everyday use. Takes good pictures.

Reviews.Title: Quality for a good price
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: I purchased this when it just came out (was a bit more expensive though) and to date, the camera works great! The pictures were of a great quality. At times even my friends would ask me to use my camera to take pictures because their camera (which was actually more expensive) did not take the pictures as well.The camera is extremely light, with the strap attached to your wrist, you might even forget that its there. That for me is a good feature as I don't like holding bulky things and I don't like heavy cameras. For others this might not be a plus. The material was not what you would initially expect as most cameras tend to made of some type of metal (which also makes it heavier). I'm not sure what it is made of, but it is not metal and it is most likely what makes it so light.Overall, I like and enjoy this camera. So does the rest of my family. (They all wanted to borrow it for their trips)

Reviews.Title: camera is very easy to use, takes great pictures.
Reviews.Author: The Doctor of Fun
Reviews.Content: i used to own a cyber-shot camera i believe it was a 7.1 and then a 10.2 mega pix. and all the pictures i took i loved especially because they were always so sharp & focused. plus the camera lasted a really long time. any way, im super happy with my new cyber-shot 12.1 also because i had the 3 year warranty plan added. so i didnt have to worry about registering the item for the warranty it was all done for me when i purchased online.

Reviews.Title: Just Pay $30 More for a Far Better Camera
Reviews.Author: ermoser603
Reviews.Content: Most people don't seem to understand camera quality. I've had the chance to compare this to my older Samsung SL201. The Samsung cost me $110 and was FAR superior in QUALITY. Camera quality does not come from the amount of megapixels. My Samsung has 10.2 MP and the pictures are far sharper, the settings can be more precisely adjusted, and the pictures are always better than this Sony. You get what you pay for. The Sony has terribly blurry pictures. I'm not sure if people notice this or not, but all you have to do is zoom in to 100% when looking at the pictures on your computer. The panoramic mode is an awesome idea, but the picture is about 10 times blurrier when you use it, and never focuses properly.Video is terrible outdoors. You cannot zoom in, and it does not auto focus properly during recording. For some reason, when recoding video outdoors, the camera likes to smear the sunlight vertically across the screen and make everything pink, even when you're not aiming at the sun. Its not really possible to get the camera to stop acting like that until you stop recording and allow it to refocus by aiming it around until you're satisfied. As a matter of fact, here's proof on my Photobucket: [...]I'm no photographer, but I do have a good amount of personal experience in graphic design. When looking at cameras, if you don't care too much about quality and like ease of use, then get this. If you are looking for better quality, just pay $30 more and you'll probably get a much nicer camera. Never base your decision off of the amount of pixels. A camera is only as good as its sensor. I would look online at comparison shots between cameras to make the best choice. Also be aware of cameras that artificially boost contrast when taking pictures to cover up bad quality. It gives the perception of high quality.

Reviews.Title: DSC-W510 - Frustrating!!
Reviews.Author: Jay56
Reviews.Content: Probably the worst camera I have every had. I have had Sony cameras before but this is a bad choice and a poor investment for my money. My wife and I have had very frustrating moments with this camera and cannot wait to change it soon. The picture quality is extremely bad after dark and with the zoom-in it is terrible. I also feel ashamed to use it in public and in front of my friends.Ease of use is good just like any other Sony but picture quality is a terrible 1 star.The camera body has a very cheap feel to it and I personally will not recommend this to anyone. Again a 1 star.Please do not buy this camera, if you can pool in a little more money and get a better model you have done good for yourself. If you have the opportunity to test it in person (in Best Buy or an electronic shop)please do so before buying. If you are buying it online hopefully you know what you are doing.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W510 12.1 Mega Pixel Pink Rose
Reviews.Author: Denise
Reviews.Content: I have only had this camera a short time and am sure it will be just as expected.  I have a business where taking photos is extremely important, Sony always delivers a great product in my opinion, but the price can be expensive.  So this is the place you needed to come for all of your accessories to go with your camera, get a bundle.  I guess it was an oversite on my part because Amazon.Com does sell this camera in a bundle list, if at all possible, do get the bundle because you will end up buying a memory stick and a spare battery.  I did buy a case on Amazon.Com, it did come with a battery, but no memory stick.  If you didn't see the bundle as I didn't, you can get a NP-BN1 Sony Battery for $2.69 through Eforcity and a 8GB Memory Stick for your Sony DSC W510 Camera for $9.99 through SoCal Trade both through Amazon.com for 14.98 and then a $7 something shipping charge in 2 separate orders totaling almost $20.  A Battery through the Sony Company directly would be $50 and Memory Sticks are a lot more as well, so this is the place to go.  It is still a lot easier to just buy a Bundle.  Hope you don't have to go through the disappointment of not having the stick when your camera arrives.  Have fun with your camera ;-)

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: leyziitaxh
Reviews.Content: ME ENCANTO LA CAMARA, EXCLENTE... BUENAS SONY. LO QUE PEDI... EXCELENTE VENDEDOR TODO COMO FUE PAUTADO. MARAVILLADA.SALUDOS DESDE VENEZUELA - VALENCIA.

Reviews.Title: Excelente Camara
Reviews.Author: freddymolinap
Reviews.Content: La camara es sencilla y facil de manejar, las fotos  la captura con una excelente calidad y un buen zoom,

Reviews.Title: Not for me!
Reviews.Author: GabVal
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera a week ago and returned it two days later cause the picture quality was awful! I tried it in every different setting and none of those gave me the picture quality that I was looking for.  If you take a picture and want to trim it later for adjustment,  the colors will just fade and the picture quality will noticeably decrease making your pictures look blurry and horrible. Something very annoying too is that the battery dies in less than two hours, after 50 shots you already have half of it gone.  I owned an old Sony cybershot DSCP32 and its picture quality is way better that this new model, I was looking for something similar so I decided to go for Canon!

Reviews.Title: Embarrassed to own it
Reviews.Author: Guarda-livros
Reviews.Content: I purchased the DSC-W510 this fall and couldn't get any quality from the photos. I hoped it was just me, BUT, my daughter (with excellent results for years on a DSC-W230) cannot get anything good from this W510 either! A professional snapped two photos of my family on Christmas--first was almost okay, a minute later (same lighting, same pose) was horrible. The quality is granular; the pictures are always somewhat blurry; the colors aren't true, regardless of lighting. I am very disappointed and embarrassed to have this camera!

Reviews.Title: SLOW and annoying
Reviews.Author: Wendy Williamson
Reviews.Content: I had a Sony Cybershot 7.2 mega pixel camera for years.  It was pretty quick, easy to use.  This newer model felt cheap, has an extensive menu with lots of features.  I would trade that for a fast, reliable camera with a great picture, like my old one.  I am returning this and getting something else.  A big disappointment.  Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: buena camara
Reviews.Author: rafael
Reviews.Content: muy buena compra, una camara con funciones muy interesantes como el detector de sorisa y la foto panoramica, el envio y la atencion de amazon exceente

Reviews.Title: went with another
Reviews.Author: Chisleme1
Reviews.Content: I chose to go with a different camera after all. I chose the Olympus vr330 because of the phenomenal price i was able to procure it at. I chose it because of its 12.5x zoom feature mainly.

ProductInfo.Features:
26mm equivalent lens with 4x optical zoom
Capture breathtaking images in Sweep Panorama Mode
SteadyShot image stabilization reduces blur
iAuto mode automatically optimizes camera settings
Face Detection and Smile Shutter technologies
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W510 12.1 MP Digital Still Camera with 4x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom Lens and 2.7-inch LCD (Red)
